item.description:
Note Change in Venue: Instead of Crema Cafe, This month we will be going out for Dim Sum at Hei La Moon to Celebrate Chinese New Years. Come pactice chinese, eat good food andget to know each other. Remember to Bring money for food. The restaurant is not expensive/Average. Hope you can join us.

For more info on Hei La Mon see link below:


http://boston.citysea...

Public transportation:

You can take MBTA to the Boylston or Arlington Stops and then:

Walk approx. 1 block E on Boylston St.
Turn right on Boylston Sq.
Walk approx. 1 block S on Boylston Sq.
Turn right on Washington St.
Walk a short distance S on Washington St.
Turn left on Beach St.
Walk approx. 2 blocks E on Beach St.


For driving directions see below:
http://maps.google.co...
item.how_to_find_us: I will have a meetup sign up

group.name: The Boston Mandarin Chinese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Come celebrate Chinese New Years with Dim Sum at Hei La Moon
